game.name: Dream Corps
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Surreal horror game. You have been selected by a sinister group to participate in a twisted game of exploration and escape. Walk through dreamy, horrifying places that evoke unease and fear.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Surreal horror game. You have been selected by a sinister group to participate in a twisted game of exploration and escape. Walk through dreamy, horrifying places that evoke unease and fear.
